fields.name: BmcCredentials
fields.description: The credentials of the baseboard management controller on this bare metal machine.

fields.name: BmcMacAddress
fields.description: The MAC address of the BMC device.

fields.name: BootMacAddress
fields.description: The MAC address of a NIC connected to the PXE network.

fields.name: MachineName
fields.description: The OS-level hostname assigned to this machine.

fields.name: SerialNumber
fields.description: The serial number of the bare metal machine.
